name: Spicy Tomato, Seafood, and Chorizo Stew
author: Jennifer Baker
summary: This spicy stew features Hunt's® petite diced tomatoes, seafood, and chorizo in one satisfying, Mexican-inspired bowl!
ingredients: 2 each poblano peppers, seeded and chopped
1 (32 ounce) container chicken stock or broth
2 (14.5 ounce) cans Hunt's® no salt added Petite Diced Tomatoes, drained
½ teaspoon ground chipotle chile pepper, or to taste
1 pound cod fillets (or other firm white fish like halibut), cut into chunks
1 pound large raw shrimp, peeled, deveined
directions: Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat
Add onion, peppers, and garlic; cook and stir until soft, 5 to 7 minutes
Add ground chorizo to pan and cook and stir, crumbling, until browned and cooked through, 5 to 7 minutes
Pour chicken stock into a large soup pot
Add Hunt's tomatoes, Mexican corn, salsa verde, cumin, chipotle, and softened onion-peppers-garlic mixture
Stir to combine, then simmer for 10 minutes to blend flavors
Stir in cod, shrimp, and reserved chorizo and continue to simmer until fish and shrimp are cooked, about 5 to 7 minutes
Serve with fresh chopped green onions, chopped cilantro, and lime wedges
